Key Match Events: The Kings and the Lakers traded haymakers for most of the second half.
Sacramento responded with a series of mini runs to crawl within 125-123 of the Lakers with 55.1 left in the game.
The Lakers exploded in the first four minutes of the fourth quarter, dropping a sizzling 21-0 run to turn a seven-point deficit into a 108-94 advantage.
Others: The LA Lakers, playing on short rest, survived a thrilling battle against the Sacramento Kings on Saturday to emerge with a 131-127 win.
